snippet.title: Lightsmith Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Get on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1453130/Lightsmith
Get on Itch.io: https://afewdragons.itch.io/lightsmith

The world has been plunged into eternal night, blanketed in darkness by eerie creatures that cannot survive in the light. Despite the gloom there is still hope as a rare source of light that grows from the ground has emerged, and a gifted few are able to manipulate it to their will; the Lightsmiths.
___________________________________________________

~ STAY UPDATED ~
